speaker: left
text: They are here...

speaker: left
text: It seems there is another Xuirist camp here, but we must proceed.

speaker: left
text: Omega's been defeated, I've got to get out of here!
(Break flees!)

speaker: right
text: They're gone... they're all gone...

speaker: right
text: I've been defeated. You win, Proton.
(Omega kneels before Proton)

speaker: right
text: Kill me however you wish.

speaker: left
text: An honorable death for a Xuirist, you will be executed.
(Proton executes Omega)

speaker: right
text: We'll be reaching the Village of Binding soon, it will be the final chance for us to prepare before entering the Shadow Realm.
[Village of Binding, Nation of Nation]

speaker: left
text: We've arrived.
???: You there! Are you what I think you are!?

speaker: left
text: Huh?
???: You must be here to stop the Shadow Realm, are you?

speaker: left
text: Yes, actually.
???: Great!
???: I am Fiyghtrr, and I have been training years for this moment!

speaker: right
text: Allow me to join you on your attack on the Shadow Realm!
[Recruit Fiyghtrr?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: ...what?
???: YOU THERE!!!

speaker: left
text: (Why does this keep happening to me...)
???: Your army looks like it's lacking members.
???: Might you need a...
???: Might you need a... REPLACEMENT UNIT?
???: Of course you do! Everyone needs a replacement unit!
???: And you are in luck!
???: You see, I am Recalper: THE ULTIMATE REPLACEMENT UNIT!!!

speaker: right
text: That's right! Got a void in your army after one of your comrades died in the field?

speaker: right
text: That void will instantly be sealed up by my greatness!

speaker: right
text: No one replaces the deceased like I do!

speaker: right
text: So, what do you think? Want to recruit me into your painfully empty army?
[Recruit Recalper?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: What!? Don't you know that you can't replace the replacement!?

speaker: left
text: It's time to enter the Shadow Realm...

speaker: left
text: We'll activate the portal at the Location of Binding and enter from there.
